title: Corrections and clarifications
summary: Locomotion No 1, a historic steam locomotive, has undergone a restoration where it was meticulously silthered and slivered. This innovative technique highlighted the locomotive's intricate details while preserving its heritage. The restoration aims to enhance public appreciation for railway history.
